78848.name: MMV Tour 5
78848.description: From St. Paul's Bay to Mellieha Bay

6275018.name: Watch Tower Walk
6275018.description: This walk starts and ends at Għadira Bay. Setting off from close to the Għadira Nature Reserve, the walk reaches the top of Marfa Ridge just beneath the austere Red Tower. Offering breathtaking views to the sea on either side.

8240320.name: Gozo Coastal Walk
8240320.description: described in publications and partly marked in the field

15954286.name: Windmills Walk (Zurrieq-Safi)
15954286.description: This circular walk strarts from the Zurrieq village center at the bus terminus an will take us through Zurrieq and Safi, as well as the surrounding countryside

15954353.name: Dingli - Fawwara - Wied iz-Zurrieq
15954353.description: The walk starts from the interpretation center close to Dingli Cliffs. This is a good place to explore the surrounding countryside, while enjoying the open sea.

15954387.name: Maqulba
15954387.description: Our walk starts in the Siggiewi main square. Siggiewi is an interesting village in its own right, and one that offers a good starting point for many countryside walks.

15954551.name: Hal Millieri
15954551.description: While walking through these three villages, one will experience the medieval aspects of the villages, the baroque parish churches that dominate them, and the surrounding countryside. You can follow this route on foot or on bike.

15955071.name: Midna Walk
15955071.description: Midna set into pleasant countryside, is ideal for walks. This route is interesting, as it goes through the medieval heart of Mdina, followed by the outskirts of Rabat, Siggiewi and ends on the Dingli Cliffs. This route can be made on foot or on bike.

15955269.name: Tas-Silg Walk A
15955269.description: This walk is a fairly easy one. It takes one along the coast, around parts of the Marsaskala and Marsaxlokk villages, St. Thomas Bay, and the pristine coasts of Munxar and Delimara. The first part of the walk is the same for everyone.

15955299.name: Tas-Silg Walk B
15955299.description: By following this route one will experience a totally different aspect of rural Malta since it passes along the coast of the island
